Name: Fruity Soap
Description: A bar of homemade soap. It smells like fruit.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una barra de jabón casero. Huele a fruta.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 집에서 만든 수제 비누. 과일 향이 난다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein Stück hausgemachte Seife. Es riecht nach Obst.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une barre de savon artisanal. Sent les fruits.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy házi készítésű szappanrúd. Gyümölcsös illata van.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ハンドメイドの石けんバー。果物の香り付き。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma barra de sabão caseiro. Cheira a fruta
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Ev yapımı kalıp sabun. Meyve gibi kokuyor.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一块自制肥皂。闻起来是水果味。
